isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9800 - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: SERVICE ACCESSIBILITY
svcproc.para: The tilt cab provides excellent service accessibility when the cab is in the tilted position. However, for minor service, an oil fill service door is provided, located to the left of foot step opening on the cab right (passenger) side. A radiator coolant access door is provided just above the front grille. This access door is where the coolant is checked at the sight glass mounted in the coolant surge tank which is mounted on top of the radiator and where the coolant can be added.

note.para: For complete details on cab RAISING/LOWERING, see Operator's Manual.
